snippet.title: Pit People Debut Teaser (Opening Cinematic)
snippet.description:
Formerly known as "Game 4" | http://www.pitpeople.com
Out now on Xbox One and Steams. Full version released on March 2, 2018.

(Things may look different in the full released version of the game.)

Shortly before the release of BattleBlock Theater we started working on something new. We schemed up a bunch of concepts and picked our strongest one. From there we fleshed out the lone survivor prototype!!! As it grew stronger and stronger, we polished it, furnished it with delights, and added (gluten free?) sprinkles. Yes, as the chicken dictates, this game is of a genre we haven't covered before and seek to breathe a new flavor into. Maybe you can find a hint in the video about which genre it is??



Video Credits:

Art/Animation: Dan Paladin
Voice: Will Stamper
Editing: Derek Lieu, Ian Moreno


Follow us on the usual:

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/thebehemoth
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/thebehemoth
Google+: http://www.google.com/+thebehemothgames
Pit People Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pitpeople
